content: Along this road are several important things to take note of: There's a lone Wolf Guardian patrolling this road, but you can also find a **Meditation Spot** just off to the left in front of a statue where two Frozen Corpses can come alive to attack.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
Along this road are several important things to take note of: There's a lone Wolf Guardian patrolling this road, but you can also find a **Meditation Spot** just off to the left in front of a statue where two Frozen Corpses can come alive to attack.
